thread.title: Chelsea players head out for dinner at fancy sushi restaurant as Antonio Conte rewards Premier League leaders for fine form
thread.title_full: Chelsea players head out for dinner at fancy sushi restaurant as Antonio Conte rewards Premier League leaders for fine form

author: tsheen
title: Chelsea players head out for dinner at fancy sushi restaurant as Antonio Conte rewards Premier League leaders for fine form
text:
EFL SLOANE RANGERS Chelsea players head out for dinner at fancy sushi restaurant as Antonio Conte rewards Premier League leaders for fine form 
Antonio Conte and the first-team squad dined at Sumosan Twiga in Sloane Street - and a there was a surprise face in the form of winger Kenedy, back from his Watford loan By TOM SHEEN
